name: 2 spacious rooms with FREE breakfast and parking
description:
Clean and comfortable hotel room with a great location for commuting around Boston! A 5 min walk to Red Line/Andrew and it will take 10 mins to get to Downtown Boston and 20 to Harvard.
FREE parking. Free hot breakfast. Free WiFi.
DUE TO NEW REGULATIONS IN THE LIGHT OF COVID-19 WE CURRENTLY SERVE GRAB&GO BREAKFAST ANS SOME AMENITIES MIGHT NOT OPERATE. TEXT FOR DETAILS.

The space
Suites consist of a living room with a pull out sofa and a small kitchenette and a bedroom with a separate door with a king-size bed, and a bathroom.
Free cable TV with free HBO.
Extra bed/free cribs/infant beds available on request.

This room is a part of the hotel complex and you are welcome to use 24 hours gym and business center. Free shuttle from airport, Cruise, Convention.
South Bay Shopping Plaza with lots of stores, restaurants, and AMC movie cinema is just 2 minutes walk.
12 mins walk to the beach.

Guest access
G
